items.title: Christchurch Cathedral
items.what_makes_it_awesome: Some things in life are just meant to be enjoyed with a beer
items.address: 26 Rolleston Ave, Christchurch Central, Christchurch 8013, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Across the road from the fountain outside the Canterbury Museum

items.title: Street Art
items.what_makes_it_awesome: There is some sweet street art on the walls around the railway track
items.address: 67 Brockworth Pl, Riccarton, Christchurch 8011, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Go down Riccarton Rd to the railway tracks, turn south and walk along the footpath
